name: Final Hope (itch)
description:
Twin Stick shooter with gamepad support or play with a keyboard using the W,S,D,A for movement and Up,Down,Left,Right for your firing positions.

Enter Lt. Belica earths commanding officer aganst the demonic invasion.

With the world being plunged into chaos the gates of hell have been opened, the demon soul has sent his loyal foot soldiers to survey and penetrate the earth but they have made one grave and deadly mistake, they have underestemated the fight and refusal to admit defeat that humans posses.

Take on the role of Lt. Belica and take the fight to the gates of hell.

We also want to hear our players feedback this will also include weekly polls on our facebook page where you will be able to vote on what you would like to see featured in Final Hope.

Currently we are Play Testing the Campagn mode this will include a full inventory system.

Expected Release 01/07/2019
